<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets interpolated value based on [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bézier_curve Bézier curve] with given control points (progress value is 0...1 for a curve that starts at pos0 and finishes at posN) <br>
[[Image:bezierInterpolation2.jpg|400px]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> progress [[bezierInterpolation]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[pos0, pos1,... posN]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>progress: [[Number]] - interpolation value

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>[pos0, pos1,... posN]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>pos: [[Array]] in format [[Position3D]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - a single point position in format [[Position3D]] based on progress value

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Quick demonstration that spawns some spheres around player object:<code>[[for]] "_i" from 0 to 1 step 0.05 do {
	[[createVehicle]] ["Sign_Sphere10cm_F",(_i [[bezierInterpolation]] [
		[[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,0],
		[[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,2,2],
		[[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [2,0,2],
		[[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,4]
	]),[],0,"CAN_COLLIDE"];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Create a map marker curve from 4 control points with overlap (progress is -0.5...1.5 instead of 0...1):<code>[[private]] _controlPoints = [[100,-90],[200,-30],[150,60],[100,90]] [[apply]] { [[player]] [[getRelPos]] [[Magic Variables#x|_x]] };
{
	[[private]] _marker = [[createMarkerLocal]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[str]] [[Magic Variables#x|_x]], [[Magic Variables#x|_x]]];
	_marker [[setMarkerTypeLocal]] "mil_objective";
	_marker [[setMarkerTextLocal]] ("P" + [[str]] [[Magic Variables#forEachIndex|_forEachIndex]]);
}
[[forEach]] _controlPoints;
[[for]] "_i" [[from]] -0.5 [[to]] 1.5 [[step]] 0.01 [[do]]
{
	[[private]] _marker = [[createMarkerLocal]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[str]] _i, _i [[bezierInterpolation]] _controlPoints];
	_marker [[setMarkerTypeLocal]] "mil_dot";
};
[[openMap]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[linearConversion]], [[vectorLinearConversion]]
</value></part></template>
